name: tm58
effect: Teaches Endure to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Sky Drop to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Endure)

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user endures any attack, leaving
1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it
is used in succession.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user endures any attack, leaving
1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it
is used in succession.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user endures any attack, leaving
1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it
is used in succession.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user hurls the target into the air,
then drops it on the second turn. The
target cannot attack while in the air.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user hurls the target into the air,
then drops it on the second turn. The
target cannot attack while in the air.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user takes the target into the sky,
then drops it during the next turn.
The target cannot attack while in the sky.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user takes the target into the sky, then drops
it during the next turn. The target cannot attack
while in the sky.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user takes the target into the sky, then drops
it during the next turn. The target cannot attack
while in the sky.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user crashes into its target while rotating its
body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
If the target has already taken some damage in the
same turn, this attack’s power is doubled.
